scrollStroke.card1Title: Pre-order Thai dishes, pick up right on time
scrollStroke.card1Body: Guests tap in early on Sala Thai, we batch the wok queue and time the pickup so pad thai and green curry stay hot the minute you step inâ€”no waiting, just scan and go.
scrollStroke.card2Title: Rush hours stay smooth with Sala Thai
scrollStroke.card2Body: During the evening rush, Sala Thai keeps online and walk-in orders in one clear lane; the kitchen fires in sequence, and guests know exactly when their order reaches the counter.
scrollStroke.img1Alt: Sala Thai counter with a guest pre-ordering Thai food
scrollStroke.img2Alt: Dashboard grouping Sala Thai pickup orders
scrollStroke.img3Alt: Kitchen workflow following the Sala Thai pickup queue
scrollStroke.img4Alt: Customer receiving a Thai dish at the Sala Thai pickup counter
